title: Problem not allowing me to play....
body:
I've looked all over for the solution and I either can't find people with the same problem or their solution doesn't work for me.

My problem is that I can normally log onto League, queue for a match, go to champ select, choose my champ and do everything else, but once champion select closes and opens the game, my game always just goes black, keeps the "League Of Legends" logo over the black screen, and says "League Of Legends (TM) Client is not responding, and it gives me the option to either close the game or keep waiting, if I wait, nothing happens, if I close it and attempt to reconnect, I get the same problem. Please help.

Thank you.

replies.body:
This specific behavior often happens as a result of a *poor connection* to the gameservers. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure everything in your local settings is up to spec.

Let me know if those steps caused any observable change in your ability to connect.
